text: Abenshi mu bahawe igitabo bifuza ko babahindura mukongera kuba abahakanyi nyuma y’uko mwemeye na nyuma y’uko ukuri (kw’Intumwa Muhamadi) kubagaragariye, kubera ishyari bafite mu mitima yabo. Ku bw’ibyo, nimubabarire munarenzeho kugeza ubwo Allah azazana itegeko rye. Mu by’ukuri, Allah ni Ushobora byose
